message.content:
cs.LO, cs.GT, cs.DS, cs.PL, cs.FL

The paper deals with regular infinite games and their solvability using different degrees of lookahead. This involves concepts from logic (parity automata), graph theory (regular games), and distributed systems (buffered communication). Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.LO (Logic in Computer Science), followed by cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory), cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms), cs.PL (Programming Languages), and cs.FL (Formal Languages and Automata Theory).
